title: SC suspends special presidential pardon granted to Duminda Silva
body_lines: The Supreme Court has issued an interim order suspending the special presidential pardon granted to former MP Duminda Silva while he was serving a death sentence.
On June 24 in 2021, President Gotabaya Rajapaksa granted presidential pardon to several prison inmates including the former parliamentarian, in view of the Poson full moon Poya day.
Former parliamentarian Duminda Silva was jailed in September 2016 after the Colombo High Court found him and several others guilty in the murder of former MP Bharatha Lakshman Premachandra.
